data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sakhalin to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sakhalin, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 490,712 lost in Sakhalin that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Sakhalin, Russia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sakhalin to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Orok people.
Pour your Spirit out on the 498,000 citizens of Sakhalin, Russia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sakhalin, Russia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sakhalin, Russia has a population of 498,000.

We estimate Sakhalin has 7,288 people who might know Jesus, 279,518 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 211,194 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,288 believers in the state of Sakhalin to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
